entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • How to use ExecuteUpdate - from a dictionary with properties and values to be applied #31470
  • Primitive collection metadata not configured for shadow collection properties #31469

Closed

  • NRT metadata is not used for element type nullability #31416
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/8.0-rc1] Change tracking API for complex types #31472

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'main' #31474
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0-rc1' => 'release/8.0' #31473
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • Bump Microsoft.AspNetCore.OData from 8.2.0 to 8.2.1 #31462
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Fully implement element nullability for primitive collections #31468
  • Bump Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos from 3.35.2 to 3.35.3 #31463
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Bump Microsoft.AspNetCore.Identity.EntityFrameworkCore from 7.0.9 to 7.0.10 #31461
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0-rc1' => 'release/8.0' #31471
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'main' #31467
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • Update branding to 9.0-alpha1 #31465
